about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the unique adventure of The Memory Thieves, a cooperative multiplayer game where 1 to 4 players take on the role of memory thieves. Explore the mysterious portals of Ravenwood Cemetery and steal forgotten treasures while avoiding hidden dangers.

MAIN FEATURES

  • Cooperative multiplayer: Play alone or form a team of four thieves to maximise your chances of success.

  • Procedural generation: Each memory is procedurally generated, offering a unique experience every time you play.

  • Different eras: Choose from different eras (only one available at launch).

  • Graphics and atmosphere: Enjoy semi-realistic graphics and a heavy, serious atmosphere that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

  • Progression system: Gain experience to level up and unlock new equipment.

  • Cursed objects: Thwart the curses of cursed rooms and objects that can negatively affect players, but which contain treasures of great value.

  • Immersive soundtrack: A simple but effective soundtrack that reinforces the mysterious atmosphere of the game.

HISTORY AND UNIVERSE

Strange phenomena are occurring in Ravenwood cemetery, revealing portals that lead to the memories of the dead. Groups of intrepid thieves see this as a unique opportunity to recover priceless treasures. But beware, for these places are well guarded by souls from the past.

EQUIPMENT AND PROGRESSION

As you make your way through the memories, you'll gain experience and money. Use them to buy new equipment and improve your skills. Some items require a specific level to be used, adding a strategic dimension to your purchases and your progression.

DEVELOPER

Developed by Otherside Studio, The Memory Thieves offers an innovative and captivating gaming experience, combining exploration, strategy and cooperation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500k or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600k or AMD Ryzen 5 2400G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in a unique cooperative multiplayer game for 1 to 4 players. Explore the graveyard of Ravenwood, pass through mysterious portals, and steal as much treasure as possible while avoiding the dangers.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Italian, German, Russian
